entry.string: SiteTools is a utility module that provides a number of related site 'housekeeping' utilities
entry.translation: SeeteTuuls is a uteelity mudoole-a thet prufeedes a noomber ooff releted seete-a 'huoosekeepeeng' uteelities

entry.string: Delete Template, RSS or ADOdb cache files
entry.translation: Delete-a Templete-a, RSS oor EDOdb ceche-a feeles

entry.string: Backup your MySQL database tables (MySQL 3.22 or higher required) Testing feedback appreciated.
entry.translation: Beckoop yuoor MySQL detebese-a tebles (MySQL 3.22 oor heegher reqooured) Testeeng feedbeck eppreceeeted. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Web Link Checker - check web links, image links and so on.
entry.translation: Veb Leenk Checker - check veb leenks, imege-a leenks und su oon.

entry.string: SiteTools only provides Administration options requiring administration priviledges.
entry.translation: SeeteTuuls oonly prufeedes Edmeenistreshun oopshuns reqooureeng edmeenistreshun preefiledges.

entry.string: Start by checking settings in the SiteTools configuration options.
entry.translation: Stert by checkeeng setteengs in zee SeeteTuuls cunffeegooreshun oopshuns. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Warning: Default cache and backup directory paths should only be changed if alternative cache or backup paths have already been created and are writeable - chmod 777. At this time, backup paths are configurable, but cache paths are not configurable from within Xaraya administration.
entry.translation: Verneeng: Deffoolt ceche-a und beckoop durectury peths shuoold oonly be-a chunged iff elterneteefe-a ceche-a oor beckoop peths hefe-a elreedy beee creeted und ere-a vreeteeble-a - chmud 777. Et thees teeme-a, beckoop peths ere-a cunffeegooreble-a, boot ceche-a peths ere-a nut cunffeegooreble-a frum veethin Xereya edmeenistreshun.

entry.string: There are no included blocks at this time.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: There are no included hooks at this time.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded huuks et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found at
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond et
